sentence.text: She wished she could convince herself that what he 'd said had merely been an idle threat .
It took me all day to convince my mother that there had been a change , but by the next afternoon I found myself flat on my back in the hospital again with injunctions not to move .
At one point , Walter tries to convince his wife that he has had a story accepted by BBC Radio .
But it 's hoped the film will help to convince youngsters that natural history is n't a dinobore .
You think you 're going to convince me that selling the club would be in my father 's best interests , with you as the kindly soul just waiting to take the burden off his hands .
Why does he not convince the Cabinet to be good Europeans and to obey the rules like France , Germany and Spain ?
Perhaps she could convince him to stop looking at her that way -- though , in her heart , she did not want to stop him .
Jean wanted to talk to him , to try to convince him to take better care of his wife .
` It 's my story , I lived it , " says Singleton , describing how he convinced a major studio to let an untried student director loose on a feature .
What if , by her doing nothing , they were able to convince him of her treachery and turn him against her for ever ?
And to get any authorisation at all , I have to convince my superiors of the danger . "
You have to convince the head teacher of your arguments . "
We are democrats and accept that until we have convinced people by the force of our argument , we should go along with the view of the majority of the organisations of which we are a member .
He was out canvassing when he encountered an old lady who was ready to vote for him as long as he could convince her about Labour Party policy on cats .
He was n't even convincing himself .
You have convinced me .
He had to convince them . ”
“ How can I convince you ?
Being entirely devoid of miners , striking or otherwise , Northern Ireland treated the election as a referendum on the power-sharing system and was overwhelmingly convinced by the loyalists .
Some farmers have been so convinced by industry-generated publicity over the absence of a proper income that they just have n't bothered declaring any income .
Then , just as I was convinced of your innocence , I discovered you 'd lied about your brother and I caught you with Rainald .
Even when you have convinced the travel agent that there is such a place , you are likely to become involved in a series of long telephone conversations .
At some point he managed to convince us his trade was respectable , nay , even smart , and now a lump of broken stone will cost you a grand .
Identify the rut , and before you try to find the way out of it convince yourself you will get out of it .
Gasping for breath , she stared wildly round to convince herself of where she was .
You must convince , persuade , and hopefully guide the media to reflect your client 's point of view .
